title: 求一款男生皮肤，要帅的
author: 断弦∑

replies.author: xiaopangju
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content:
【上古之石】魔樱大陆 冥界篇の皮肤合集
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-626037-1-1.html


这个帅不~

replies.author: 暗夜Elen
replies.txt_content:
每个人的审美不同对于帅的定义也不同，建议自己前往皮肤版寻找
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum-skin-1.html
以及皮肤版资源索引贴（有段时间没更新了）http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-540042-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-42683-1-1.html

replies.author: 暖雨泪
replies.txt_content: 我这里有哈awa可以加我904261064，然后采纳Awa

replies.author: Delamer
replies.txt_content: 还有什么皮肤能比我史蒂夫更帅？

replies.author: Mike_Play_OK
replies.txt_content: 建议用MCSkin3D去画一个原创的皮肤。https://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/mcskin3d/

replies.author: YY-HeiDaDa
replies.txt_content: 外站的皮肤有很多的...我觉得你用桐人的头像那就桐人的模型比较帅吧（你的金粒吸引到我了。）
